title: Fencing Uniform
desc:
Post 13
This card stays in your inventory. Instead of taking your movement as regular, you may choose one of two options:
Advance: Advance to the next space (activating stop-in effects), then roll a die and move based on the roll.
Advance-Lunge: Advance to the next space. If you move into a property with another player, you stab them, forcing them to lose 400$ or any card from their inventory (you choose).
